data.description:
Super Screen offers VR users a unique and immersive viewing experience. This application creates virtual environments such as cinemas and classrooms within VR, offering users a mixed reality (MR) experience that blends the virtual and real worlds. It supports various video formats including 2D, 3D, 180-degree, and 360-degree videos, and can play videos in resolutions up to 8K, ensuring an ultimate visual experience. Users can also conveniently share media files from computers within the same local area network to their VR devices. Support DVD ISO decoding and playback, such as :Blu-ray ISO 2D, mkv, m2ts, ts, mts, etc.

A notable feature of Super Screen is its multi-platform support, including PC operating systems like Windows and Mac, allowing users to stream video content from their PCs to the big screen in their VR device. This cross-platform capability makes Super Screen suitable not just for entertainment purposes, like watching movies, but also for educational and business environments, such as virtual classrooms and meeting rooms. In education, it offers students a more immersive learning experience; in business, it can be used for virtual meetings, providing a more interactive and immersive meeting experience. Streaming support for the Linux platform is currently under development and will be available in future versions.

changelog.change_log:
1 Intelligent 3D exploration: The new algorithm automatically identifies the 3D formats of videos and pictures. Because it consumes a certain amount of performance, it is temporarily turned off by default and needs to be started manually in the settings.
2 Interaction optimization of the interface: 360° rotation of the viewing screen, the joystick can control the front and rear distance when viewing 180° videos and pictures, SBS adds left and right eye perspective swaps, etc.

1. Experimental support for image formats: 2D/3D image formats such as .jpg and .png are now supported, allowing you to swim in the ocean of visual art. (Already supports dlna/PC client/U disk)
2. Experimental support for U disk video playback: Added support for NTFS format U disk, making video playback more free and convenient (exFAT format support will be launched soon).
3. Optimize 4K video Ambilight technology to avoid lagging and make streaming movies smooth and extraordinary.
4. Fix the abnormal display problem of FULL-SBS format

1. Experimental support for image formats: Now supports .jpg, .png and other 2D/3D image formats, allowing you to swim in the ocean of visual art. (Already supports dlna/PC client/U disk)
2. Experimental support for USB disk video playback: Added support for NTFS format USB disks, making video playback more free and convenient (exFAT format support will be launched soon).
3. Optimized 4K video Ambilight technology to avoid lagging and make streaming movies smooth and extraordinary.

1. Added audio track selection function: Added audio track selection, you can freely select the audio track according to your preference, which improves the flexibility of watching movies.
2 New player control function: Added previous and next buttons to the player to facilitate quick switching to the next video in the folder, improving operational convenience.
3 Optimize the screen display effect: The screen color streamer overflow effect improves the screen display effect. This is an experimental function and may increase performance consumption and cause lag. You can turn it on in the settings for early adopters.
4 Solve the problem of video proportion: Fixed the problem that the original proportion cannot be maintained when playing files, ensuring the correct display and viewing experience of the video.
5 Fixed the display problem of Hebrew and other subtitles to meet the text display needs of more users.

1. Double speed playback support: Added 0.5 to 2.0 video multiple playback, allowing you to adjust the video playback speed according to your personal preferences, thereby obtaining a more personalized viewing experience.
2. Optional 3D option: Added the default video 3D option in the settings, whether the video is opened in 3D mode or 2D mode, providing you with more flexibility.
3. Automatic light adjustment in theater mode: An intelligent light adjustment function is added, which automatically dims the lights when playing content and restores them after the video ends, creating a better viewing atmosphere.
4. LAN page optimization: Added dlna, smb, ssair type tags to the LAN page to make file sharing and playback more intuitive and convenient.

1. Optimized PC streaming mouse control, bringing lower latency and smoother operating experience.
2. The playback recording function has been enhanced to automatically save the playback progress so that you can continue watching directly next time.
3. Subtitle file display and management are optimized to provide more flexible subtitle selection and hiding functions.
4. Fixed some issues that caused crashes and improved the stability of the application.
